description:
“This has saved me so much time and energy!”

 “This app works. No other way of putting it. Try it out and you won't be disappointed.”

 “SO MANY PLACES TO RENT!! Definitely a great download!”

Looking for an apartment or house for rent? 

Trulia Rentals for iPhone and iPad takes the pain out of finding your next rental.

Trulia - Homes for Rent is for properties in the USA only at this time 

FEATURES

• Interactive Maps: See maps showing crime, school zones, average rental prices, and more

• Find an apartment or home for rent on an intuitive map view

• Share rental listings easily with roommates and family

• See nearby restaurants, grocery stores, and more

• Contact landlords and rental property managers on the go

• Customize your rental search by location, price, number of beds and baths, and more

• Save a search and get alerted when rental homes hit the market – you’ll be the first to know

Never miss a listing with our apartment finder – we identify the newest homes and apts for rent that match your search criteria and notify you as soon as they’re available. 

Note: Unfortunately, we don’t currently support searching for pet-friendly rental homes. Stay tuned, we’ll let you know when it’s ready! 

Comments, suggestions, bug reports? Let us know what you think about Trulia Rentals at iPhone_For_Rent@trulia.com
trackCensoredName: Trulia Rentals - Find Homes and Apartments for Rent
trackName: Trulia Rentals - Find Homes and Apartments for Rent
releaseNotes:
With this release, we’ve optimized our apps for iOS 8 and completely redesigned our iPad app to be more visual and immersive. In addition to that we can now provide nearby home alerts to you. Be the first to respond for your dream rental home!

You’ll notice:
• A new, photo-centric layout in the map view
• Beautiful, full-bleed photos on each home’s detail page
• Easier access to Trulia's crime, school, and amenity maps
 
Tip: Trulia will keep you in the know when new homes come on the market that meet your criteria. Save a search to get started.
